snippet: Prosecutors said Choo Chin-woo had “spread false information” through articles and a podcast linking President Park Geun-hye’s brother to a relative’s killing.
abstract: South Korean prosecutors are seeking to arrest journalist Choo Chin-woo on charges of violating election laws for reporting unconfirmed suspicion ahead of presidential vote in Dec 2012 that Pres Park Geun-hye's brother might have been involved in killing of a relative.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors said Choo Chin-woo had “spread false information” through articles and a podcast linking President Park Geun-hye’s brother to a relative’s killing.

headline.seo: South Korea Seeks Journalist’s Arrest in Defamation Case
headline.main: South Korea Seeks Journalist’s Arrest in Defamation Case
headline.print_headline: South Korea Seeks Journalist’s Arrest in Defamation Case
